thread.title: BRIEF-Soros Fund Management Dissolves Share Stake In Mondelez Intl Inc‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Soros Fund Management Dissolves Share Stake In Mondelez Intl Inc‍​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Soros Fund Management:
* SOROS FUND MANAGEMENT DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON.COM INC - SEC FILING ‍​
* SOROS FUND MANAGEMENT DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN MONDELEZ INTL INC
* SOROS FUND MANAGEMENT- CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017 : ( bit.ly/2EsFJAg ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 : ( bit.ly/2BPts3d )
